Introducing the Silk Cushion Collection – India's first cream-liquid face range with a viral cushion-tip applicator for flawless, radiant skin.

Blush it your way: Just dot, blend, and glow with 4 pigment-packed, silky blushes – Bouquet of Roses, Strawberry Champagne, Coral Cascade, and Violet Veil.

Why you’ll love it:

Buildable, blendable & packed with pigment

Cushion-tip for precise, mess-free application

Enriched with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid

Made for Indian skin tones, suits all types

Feather-light, silky formula

100% vegan & cruelty-free

Formulated in Italy

Pro tip: Twist & lock after use!


Say hello to Lip Shots – your mini lipstick must-haves!

Featuring 4 bestselling ON & OFF shades, these 1.2ml minis deliver intense, weightless color with 12-hour smudge-proof wear.

Why you’ll love them:

Liquid matte with one-swipe pigment

Blurs lines with a soft-focus finish

Packed with Raspberry Stem Cells, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid

Non-drying, velvety formula that stays comfy

Mini, mess-free & made for on-the-go

Mask-proof, kiss-proof, food-proof

Big color. Tiny tube. All the impact.

entry.title: Silk Cushion Blush & Contour Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Silk Cushion
Price: 1699.00

Introducing the Silk Cushion collection - a range of buildable, blendable cream-liquid face products that are married with a convenient, easy-to-use viral cushion-tip applicator for precise application that leaves you with gorgeous radiance that lasts. The name says it all, as the texture feels smooth like silk, and the shades are designed for Indian skin tones!

Highlighter: Discover the pearl-infused highlighter wands and unlock the secret to a luminous, soft-focus radiance. The collection includes two glow-giving highlighters: Dipped in Gold and Diamond Fizz
Whether you're in search of a pink highlighter makeup, a versatile makeup highlighter stick, or a liquid highlighter for face, the Silk Cushion collection offers it all, providing every beauty enthusiast with the perfect tools for achieving a dazzling highlight. Remember to twist & lock after each use to preserve the high quality of this cherished liquid highlighter collection.

Why is it special:

• Pigmented yet buildable liquid highlighter makeup formula that ensures flawless blending
• Precision cushion tip for easy, no-mess application of the highlighter pen makeup
• Treated Pearls brighten and add radiant, luminous soft glow, setting itself apart as the best liquid highlighter
• Enriched with skin-nourishing Vitamin E and Hyaluronic Acid, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin
• Designed for Indian skin tones, suitable for all skin types
• Weightless, silky-luxe liquid formula guarantees an even blend, setting the bar high for face highlighter makeup
• Remember to twist & lock after each use!
• Formulated in Italy
• Dermatologically Tested.

100% Vegan, Paraben and cruelty free.

entry.title: pH-antastic Colour Adjusting Blush
entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Blush
Price: 899.00

Introducing the Typsy Beauty's pH-antastic Colour Adjusting Blush – India's first Powder tint blush is here. This truly innovative product adapts to your skin's unique pH and moisture levels, delivering a custom glow, just for you. With its ultra-fine, finely milled texture, the blush blends effortlessly, giving you a fresh, radiant finish that lasts up to 8 hours. Lightweight and breathable, it feels like a second skin, offering a flawless, filter-like effect that’s universally flattering and perfect for all skin tones.

What Makes It So Good:
  • pH-Adaptive Formula: Reacts to your skin’s unique pH and moisture level, creating a blush shade tailored just for you
  • Powder Tint Technology: India's first powder tint blush that offers long-lasting color that stays vibrant for up to 8 hours, giving you a flawless, fresh glow throughout the day
  • Soft, Featherlight Texture: Ultra-fine particles ensure a breathable, lightweight feel with a “zero-powder” sensation, making it perfect for all-day wear
  • Easy to Blend & Layer: The finely milled powder blends effortlessly into your skin, creating a natural, seamless finish without harsh lines
  • Brightening Mineral Pigments: Adds a subtle radiance, enhancing your complexion with a fresh, natural glow
  • Oil Control: Provides a matte finish without shine, giving you a smooth, balanced look that lasts all day
  • Moisturizing & Skin Conditioning: Infused with nourishing ingredients, this blush feels hydrating and comfortable on your skin

100% Vegan & Cruelty-free.

entry.s:vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty Procurement Services Pvt. Ltd.
Type: Rose Blush
Price: 959.00

India's first 3D makeup product!

Stop and smell the roses with Enchanted Garden, India's first 3D makeup product, a rose-shaped cream blush that will elevate your beauty routine. Infused with Carnauba and Vitamin E, this buttery blush blends seamlessly onto your skin, giving you a natural-looking, flushed pop of color on your cheeks. Available in beautiful shade of nude pink blush, this cream formula provides buildable color that lasts all day. Unlike real flowers, our rose is truly eternal and will not melt or lose shape. You can apply this forever rose blush using a brush or your fingers for a flawless finish.

What makes it so goood:
  • India's first 3D makeup product
  • Formulated with Carnauba and Vitamin E
  • Melts and blends seamlessly into the skin for a natural blush on cheeksr
  • A forever rose concept- the blush doesnt lose its shape during the life of the product or application
  • Can be applied using a blush brush or your fingers  for a flawless blush application
  • Provides a healthy, rosy glow with its creamy, blendable formula
  • Long-lasting matte blush color stays vibrant all day

100% Vegan, Paraben and Cruelty-free.
